Description: Reverend Reeves Gabrels Dirtbike Condition: This Reeves Gabrels Dirtbike is in excellent condition! Serial Number: 30578 Weight: 7.4 lbs The Reeves Gabrels Dirtbike signature guitar was designed in collaboration with the artist himself to be simple and have "no frills." It sports many true-to-Reverend features such as a korina solid body, pin-lock tuners, a comfortable medium oval neck profile, and a bass contour knob. The guitar is loaded with a single Reeves Gabrels signature pickup, and is equipped with a Wilkinson WVS50 tremolo. "what i think is cool about this guitar is the fact that i have a whole ongoing story /reason/explanation of always having a no frills simple, fast and blue thing to zip around on that threads thru my whole life. this guitar is a continuation of that sense of freedom in the form of speed and power stripped down to its essentials. and reverend guitars matched the light metallic blue color of both of its two wheeled predecessors. to me a single pickup guitar with a trem is just like my 1966 shwinn stingray with the extension spring on the front wheel or my 1971 honda dirtbike w/the raised front fender and slightly extended fork. it's a guitar with enough agility that it will let you grab air and do wheelies and the power to leave some rubber on the asphalt in front of the neighbor’s house. and, really, that's all you need. did i mention it's blue?" -Reeves Gabrels Features & Technical Specs: Body Wood: Korina solidbody Body Color/Finish: Metallic Emerald Neck Wood: 3-piece korina Neck Profile: Medium oval Neck Radius: 12" Neck Joint: Set neck Fingerboard: Blackwood Fingerboard Inlays: Dots Frets: 22 medium jumbo Nut: Boneite Nut Width: 43mm Tuners: Reverend Pin Lock Scale Length: 24.75" Bridge: Wilkinson WVS50 IIK tremolo Pickups: Reverend Reeves Gabrels Signature Controls: Volume, Tone, Bass Contour, 3-Way Jack Location: Side Hardware Finish: Chrome Case: Not included Country Of Origin: South Korea
Title: Reverend Reeves Gabrels Dirtbike Guitar Metallic Emerald Premium Preowned
